```python
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np

# Define functions
def total_revenue(df):
    # Calculate total revenue
    return df.shape[0] * df["Revenue"]

def arkansas_revenue(df):
    # Calculate revenue from Arkansas game
    df = df[df["Game"] == "Arkansas"].reset_index(drop=True)
    return df["Revenue"]

def texas_tech_revenue(df):
    # Calculate revenue from Texas tech game
    df = df[df["Game"]!= "Arkansas"].reset_index(drop=True)
    return df["Revenue"]

# Read in data
data = pd.read_csv("razorback_data.csv")

# Calculate total revenue
print(total_revenue(data))

# Calculate revenue from Arkansas game
print(arkansas_revenue(data))

# Calculate revenue from Texas tech game
print(texas_tech_revenue(data))
```
